sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_7b45690ddbcb0a50b1ba54ebd396197f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><business_calendar/><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><entered_time/><max_drift/><name>Run purging jobs_2</name><offset/><offset_type>0</offset_type><run_as display_value="Operator Ctirad Navratil">6df6d9491bd445d81a46b80c9b4bcb09</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:03:00</run_period><run_start>2024-06-21 13:43:43</run_start><run_time>1969-12-31 23:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[(function() {

    var maxParalelJobs = gs.getProperty('dhlex.purge.concurrent_jobs', 1);
    var tableName = 'u_ecase_purge_table';
    if (new global.tablesToPurge().getJob(tableName, maxParalelJobs)) {
        new global.tablesToPurge().purgeFrom(tableName, current.name);
    }
})();]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>snc_operator_cnavrati</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-25 17:32:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>7b45690ddbcb0a50b1ba54ebd396197f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run purging jobs_2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_7b45690ddbcb0a50b1ba54ebd396197f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>snc_operator_cnavrati</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-29 12:55:18</sys_updated_on><time_zone/><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

09:06:37</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Seznam systémových tabulek (začínajících řetězcem „sys_“, seznam s položkami oddělenými čárkami), ze kterých lze vytvářet sestavy. Ve výchozím nastavení ze systémových tabulek nelze vytvářet sestavy.</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>de</language><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-08 11:01:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>ccae9a23db3c011010232e730596199e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-08 11:01:56</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Liste von Systemtabellen (beginnend mit "sys_", kommagetrennt), zu denen Berichte erstellt werden können. Standardmäßig können keine Berichte zu Systemtabellen erstellt werden.</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>es</language><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-23 13:54:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>75e510a41b910510ec4663936b4bcb4c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-23 13:54:13</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Lista de tablas del sistema (comenzando por "sys_", separado por comas) que se pueden incluir en el informe. De forma predefinida, las tablas del sistema no se pueden incluir en informes.</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>fi</language><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_id>3106a3cf1bd106101118986c9b4bcb77</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Luettelo järjestelmätaulukoista (alkaa sys_, pilkuilla eroteltu), jotka ovat raportoitavissa. Oletuksena järjestelmätaulukot eivät ole raportoitavissa. </value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>fq</language><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_id>dfff9f0f1b1106101118986c9b4bcbe9</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Liste des tableaux de système (commençant par "sys_", séparés par des virgules) qui peuvent être déclarés. Par défaut, les tableaux du système ne peuvent pas être déclarés. </value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>fr</language><sys_created_by>css_admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-22 17:25:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>1bbcf340db15811092cd2b65059619d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>css_admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-22 17:25:48</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Liste de tables système (commençant par"sys_" séparées par des virgules) qui peuvent figurer dans un rapport. Par défaut, les tables système ne peuvent pas figurer dans un rapport.</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>he</language><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-23 18:48:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>5d39d9ac1b95c110389110628b4bcb9f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-23 18:48:16</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>רשימת טבלאות המערכת (מתחילה במחרוזת "_sys"; מופרדת באמצעות פסיקים) הניתנות לדיווח. כברירת מחדל, טבלאות מערכת אינן ניתנות לדיווח.</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>hu</language><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_id>5a09db0b1b5dc2101118986c9b4bcb76</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Azoknak a rendszertábláknak listája "sys_" táblával kezdve, vesszővel elválasztva), amelyekről jelentés készíthető. Alapértelmezés szerint a rendszertáblákról nem készíthető jelentés. </value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>it</language><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-08 14:00:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>ec978b23dbfc411010232e73059619e0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-08 14:00:49</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Elenco di tabelle di sistema (che iniziano con "sys_", separato da virgole), che sono segnalabili. Per impostazione predefinita, le tabelle di sistema non sono segnalabili.</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>ja</language><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-06 15:25:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>50017005dba5095092cd2b65059619a5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-06 15:25:17</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>レポート可能なシステムテーブルのリスト ("sys_" から始まる、カンマ区切り形式)。デフォルトでは、システムテーブルはレポート不可能です。</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>ko</language><sys_created_by>css_admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-12 17:35:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>fb588c031be1015042b8a64e3b4bcbbb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>css_admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-12 17:35:36</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>보고 가능한 시스템 테이블 목록("sys_"로 시작되고, 쉼표로 구분됨). 기본적으로 시스템 테이블은 보고할 수 없습니다.</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>nb</language><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-08 12:32:00</sys_created_on><sys_id>ef333e2bdb74411010232e73059619d7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-08 12:32:00</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Liste over systemtabeller (som begynner med «sys_», og er kommadelt), som kan rapporteres. Systemtabeller kan som standard ikke rapporteres.</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>nl</language><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-22 22:40:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>94e4cd541b1d81109aa7fd509b4bcbab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-22 22:40:58</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Lijst van systeemtabellen (beginnend met "sys_", met komma's gescheiden) die kunnen worden opgenomen in rapporten. Systeemtabellen kunnen standaard niet worden opgenomen in rapporten.</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>pb</language><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_id>140ca7831bd506101118986c9b4bcbd9</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Lista de tabelas do sistema (começando com "sys_", separadas por vírgulas) que são passíveis de geração de relatório. Como padrão, as tabelas do sistema não são portáteis. </value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>pl</language><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-23 23:37:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>f76b96641bd145104b7c99b59b4bcb32</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-23 23:37:37</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Lista tabel systemowych (rozpoczynających się od "sys_" i rozdzielonych przecinkami), które mogą być uwzględniane w raportach. Domyślnie tabele systemowe nie są uwzględniane w raportach.</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>pt</language><sys_created_by>css_admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-05 19:40:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>45c1acfc1b65c1509aa7fd509b4bcb99</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>css_admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-05 19:40:13</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Lista de tabelas de sistema (que começam por "sys_", separadas por vírgulas) que podem ser reportadas. Por predefinição, as tabelas de sistema não são reportadas.</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>ru</language><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-06 00:17:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>d541ad301be185104b7c99b59b4bcbda</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-06 00:17:40</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Список системных таблиц (начинаются с «sys_», разделены запятыми), пригодных для составления отчетов. По умолчанию системные таблицы непригодны для отчетов.</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>sv</language><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-23 04:28:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>0084da18db15c110dbf45a3bd3961935</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-23 04:28:50</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Lista över systemtabeller (som börjar med ”sys_”, kommaavgränsade), som kan rapporteras. Som standard går det inte att rapportera systemtabeller.</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>th</language><sys_created_by>css_admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-13 03:42:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>f6535acf1b69815042b8a64e3b4bcb42</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>css_admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-13 03:42:50</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>รายการของตารางระบบ (ขึ้นต้นด้วย "sys_", และคั่นด้วยเครื่องหมายจุลภาค) ที่สามารถรายงานได้ ตามค่าเริ่มต้น ตารางระบบไม่สามารถรายงานได้</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>tr</language><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-06 05:32:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>6449a2b41be901901d3441939b4bcb1a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-06 05:32:12</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Raporlanabilen sistem tabloları listesi ("sys_" ile başlayan, virgülle ayrılmış). Varsayılan olarak, sistem tabloları raporlanamaz.</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>zh</language><sys_created_by>css_admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-13 08:25:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>88041fc71be9055042b8a64e3b4bcba0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>css_admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-13 08:25:17</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>可报告的系统表列表(以“sys_”开头，逗号分隔)。默认情况下，系统表格是不可报告的。</value></sys_translated_text><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="glide.ui.permitted_tables" tablename="sys_properties">c3dee8670a0a0aa70064b48de5ad973e</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>zt</language><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-02-06 10:48:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>a4b1b3701be1099042b8a64e3b4bcb8b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-02-06 10:48:42</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>可報告的系統資料表清單 (從 "sys_" 開始，以逗號分隔)。根據預設，系統資料表不能進行提報。</value></sys_translated_text></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_55e7e4f4dbe7ca54b1ba54ebd39619ba
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><business_calendar/><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><entered_time/><max_drift/><name>Run purging jobs_4</name><offset/><offset_type>0</offset_type><run_as display_value="Operator Ctirad Navratil">6df6d9491bd445d81a46b80c9b4bcb09</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:03:00</run_period><run_start>2024-06-21 13:47:47</run_start><run_time>1969-12-31 23:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[(function() {
    var maxParalelJobs = gs.getProperty('dhlex.purge.concurrent_jobs', 1);
    var tableName = 'u_ecase_purge_table';
    if (new global.tablesToPurge().getJob(tableName, maxParalelJobs)) {
        new global.tablesToPurge().purgeFrom(tableName, current.name);
    }
})();]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>snc_operator_cnavrati</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-19 14:57:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>55e7e4f4dbe7ca54b1ba54ebd39619ba</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run purging jobs_4</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_55e7e4f4dbe7ca54b1ba54ebd39619ba</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>snc_operator_cnavrati</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-29 12:55:18</sys_updated_on><time_zone/><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><business_calendar/><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><entered_time/><max_drift/><name>Run purging jobs_5</name><offset/><offset_type>0</offset_type><run_as display_value="Operator Ctirad Navratil">6df6d9491bd445d81a46b80c9b4bcb09</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:03:00</run_period><run_start>2024-06-21 13:49:49</run_start><run_time>1969-12-31 23:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[(function() {
    var maxParalelJobs = gs.getProperty('dhlex.purge.concurrent_jobs', 1);
    var tableName = 'u_ecase_purge_table';
    if (new global.tablesToPurge().getJob(tableName, maxParalelJobs)) {
        new global.tablesToPurge().purgeFrom(tableName, current.name);
    }
})();]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>snc_operator_cnavrati</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-19 14:57:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>9ef7a4f4dbe7ca54b1ba54ebd39619c8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run purging jobs_5</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_9ef7a4f4dbe7ca54b1ba54ebd39619c8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>snc_operator_cnavrati</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-29 12:55:18</sys_updated_on><time_zone/><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>
